functions.description: Screens stocks based on given criteria.
functions.name: ARBOR_SCREEN

parameters.description: The screening criteria
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: The direction to output the results, 0 for vertical, 1 for horizontal, default 0
parameters.name: direction

functions.description: Answers questions about a company based on its stock symbol in a short format.
functions.name: ARBOR_CHAT

parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company
parameters.name: ticker

parameters.description: The question to ask about the company
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Whether to return a long answer
parameters.name: longAnswer

functions.description: Answers questions about a company based on its stock symbol in a short format.
functions.name: ARBOR_NUMBER

parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company
parameters.name: ticker

parameters.description: The question to ask about the company
parameters.name: query

functions.description: Answers factual questions about a company based on its stock symbol.
functions.name: ARBOR_FACTUAL

parameters.description: The stock symbol of the company
parameters.name: ticker

parameters.description: The factual question to ask about the company
parameters.name: query

functions.description: Returns company information as an entity
functions.name: COMPANY_INFO

parameters.description: The stock ticker symbol
parameters.name: ticker

functions.description: Returns the value of the specified balance sheet key for the given stock symbol.
functions.name: BALANCE_SHEET

parameters.description: The stock symbol to fetch data for
parameters.name: ticker

parameters.description: The year to fetch data for
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: The quarter to fetch data for, default 0 for full year, 1 for Q1, 2 for Q2, 3 for Q3, 4 for Q4
parameters.name: quarter

parameters.name: quarter

parameters.name: quarter
